segments.text: I decided to take Kenny to the park and get some fresh air .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How was it ? Were there a lot of kids ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It wasn't too crowded , but we had a great time ! We got on the see-saw together , then went on a couple of different slides and then I tried to go with him in the jungle gym , but I didn't fit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds like fun ! When we go he always just likes to play in the sandbox .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , but today he was really hyper . He even got on the monkey bars and then he went on to go on the swings for a half hour . I'm exhausted !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You should go to the park more often since you don't go to the gym anymore !
segments.speaker: S1
